thread.title: Watch: The journey of a suitcase
thread.title_full: Watch: The journey of a suitcase

title: Watch: The journey of a suitcase
text:
Watch: The journey of a suitcase Last updated 10:02, August 19 2015 Amsterdam Schiphol Airport 
Have you ever wondered what happens to your suitcase after you've checked it in? 
Have you ever wondered what happens to your suitcase after you've checked it in? 
Amsterdam's Schiphol Airport has let us in on the mystery. 
This oddly mesmerising three-minute video through the "labyrinthine bowels of the airport" reveals what happens from the moment luggage is tagged at check in, to when it miraculously appears on the baggage carousel at the end of your journey. 
The POV video captured by a camera attached to a suitcase reveals the technology it takes to keep millions of travellers moving around the world.
